title: List of Outer Hebrides
summary: The Outer Hebrides is a chain of more than 100 islands and small skerries located about 70 kilometres (43Â mi) west of mainland Scotland. There are 15 inhabited islands in this archipelago, which is also known as the Western Isles and archaically as the Long Isle (Scottish Gaelic: An t-Eilean Fada).[Note 1]
